title: US pension funds with $1.8tn in assets look to increase investment in India
description: US pension funds and endowments with $1.8 trillion in assets are visiting India to explore investment opportunities in healthcare, energy, and other sectors. Led by US Consul General Mike Hankey, the delegation aims to boost US investments in India, focusing on high returns for American retirees while supporting India's growth.
